answers.answer: 14 days or less as u say it. And am sooo done too. Jst wana hold my baby n am soo ready for the sleepless nights of hearing baby cry n putin to sleep

Hi.  I only have 10 more days.  Hopefully he comes on my birthday 29 March or around my bfs bday which is the 30th. I'm really done.  My swollen feet and ankles can't handle it no more lol. I might get induced if I have preeclampsia.  Had to do a 24hr urine collection twice already. It's hard not having any salt for 24hrs. I just hope me and baby come out okay.  Anyone dilated yet?  I was 2cm on Friday!
I have 27 days, give or take a few! I'm feeling huge & restless. Time is slowing down :(
27 days. Big & uncomfortable but want my baby to bake at least one more week.
19 days feeling so crampy all the time I'm really hoping it's a sign she won't keep me waiting to long, I'm dying to meet her so are her 2 big brothers and big sis  :)

I haven't been checked yet for any dilation.  Shoukd get checked this Friday. Although, I did wake up at 6 am to painful contractions in my back and couldn't sleep for about 2 hours due to inconsistent contractions. Maybe my big day is even closer! Fingers crossed!  Good luck on delivery day ladies and I hope you all can get some rest before then!

question: I have 15 more days (hopefully less)! I can't wait to push that button! Anyone else closing in on their due date? How are you feeling? I. Am. Done.
title: getting close!!!!
